KnowledgeBase.Title: Example String isString 001
KnowledgeBase.TypeKeywords:
Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector
FltVector ObjVector Structure Dictionary Directory
Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex

Example.Description: These examples check if the argument object is of type String or Text. If it is, the function returns true, otherwise, it returns false.

Syntax.Hints: It is important to remember that String constants that are 7 characters or less are by default assigned a type of Text unless explicitly assigned to a String Symbol variable.
